#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

#define gc getchar

void scanInt(long long& x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(; (c < 48 || c > 57); c = gc());
for(; (c > 47 && c < 58); c = gc())
x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + c - 48;
}
int main()
{
    long long int n, sum=0,i,j;
    scanInt(n);
    vector<bool>arr(n+1,true);
    for(i=2; i*i<=n;++i)
        {
            if(arr[i])
            {
                for(j=i*i;j<=n;j+=i)
                    arr[j]=false;
            }
        }
    for(i=2;i<=n;++i)
    {
        if(arr[i])
            sum+=i;
    }
    printf("%lld",sum);
    return 0;
    }
